message.body: Hi Geoff , could you send me your address? I can't wait to see you tomorrow, should be there by noon or two. Let me know if you want me to bring anything down from Philly. ####

######################## looking forward to it too. ￼Lara just sent me this one a few minutes ago, saying she's resting up for all the weekend fun.  don't think you need to bring anything in particular, just your dancin' shoes.
Hey Geoff we will be there earlier than expected. Probably in an hour. We are at the Belcamp exit now.
great. you guys going to be hungry when you get here? we were going to make some catfish sandwiches if that sounds ok to you.
Yes that sounds great but if u don't wana go to all the trouble we could go get big bad wolf BBQ .
